mapper.select: /* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCust */ SELECT a.rid as rid /* RID */ ,a.cust_type_cd as custTypeCd /* 고객 유형 코드 */ ,a.cust_nm as custNm /** 고객 명 */ ,CONVERT(varchar(10), a.birth_dt, 120) as birthDt /* 생년월일 */ ,a.gen_gbn_cd as genGbnCd /* 성별 구분 코드 */ ,CONVERT(varchar(10), a.real_birth_dt, 120) as realBirthDt /* 생년월일 */ ,a.lunar_gbn_cd as lunarGbnCd /* 양음력 구분 코드 */ ,a.identi_type_cd as identiTypeCd /* 식별 유형 코드 */ ,a.identi_val as identiVal /* 식별 값 */ ,a.realnm_certi_yn as realnmCertiYn /* 실명 인증 여부 */ ,CONVERT(varchar(10), a.realnm_certi_date, 120) as realnmCertiDate FROM loy.loy_cust a WHERE 1=1 and a.rid = #{rid}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.clearMaskCust */ SELECT a.rid as rid /** RID */ ,a.cust_type_cd as custTypeCd /** 고객 유형 코드 */ ,a.cust_nm as custNm /** 고객 명 */ ,a.cust_nm as custNmR /** 고객 명 */ ,a.birth_dt as birthDt /** 생년월일 */ ,a.gen_gbn_cd as genGbnCd /** 성별 구분 코드 */ ,a.real_birth_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD' as realBirthDt /** 실 생년월일 */ ,a.lunar_gbn_cd as lunarGbnCd /** 양음력 구분 코드 */ ,a.identi_type_cd as identiTypeCd /** 식별 유형 코드 */ ,a.identi_val as identiVal ,a.realnm_certi_yn as realnmCertiYn /** 실명 인증 여부 */ ,CONVERT(varchar(10), a.realnm_certi_date, 120) as realnmCertiDate FROM loy.loy_cust a WHERE 1=1
and a.rid = #{rid}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustAddInfoList */ SELECT a.rid as rid /* 부가정보 RID */ ,a.rid_cust as ridCust /* RID_고객 */ ,a.add_info_type_cd as addInfoTypeCd /* 부가 정보 유형 코드 */ ,cd.mark_name as addInfoTypeNm /* 부가 정보 유형 명 */ ,a.attr_type_cd as attrTypeCd /* 속성 유형 코드 */ ,cd1.mark_name as attrTypeNm /* 속성유형명*/ ,a.attr_val as attrVal /* 속성 값*/ ,CONVERT(varchar(10), a.create_date, 120) as createDate ,CONVERT(varchar(10), a.modify_date, 120) as modifyDate ,em.name as createBy ,em1.name as modifyBy FROM loy.loy_cust_add_info a WITH (NOLOCK) left join com.crm_user us WITH (NOLOCK) on a.create_by = us.rid left join com.crm_user us1 WITH (NOLOCK) on a.modify_by = us1.rid left join com.employee em WITH (NOLOCK) on us.id_employee = em.id left join com.employee em1 WITH (NOLOCK) on us1.id_employee = em1.id left join com.comm_code cd WITH (NOLOCK) on a.add_info_type_cd = cd.code_name and cd.group_code = 'LOY_CUST_ADD_INFO_CD' and cd.flag = 1 and cd.lang = #{lang} left join com.comm_code cd1 WITH (NOLOCK) on a.attr_type_cd = cd1.code_name and cd1.group_code = 'LOY_DATA_TYPE_CD' and cd1.flag = 1 and cd1.lang = #{lang} WHERE ${strSVCType} and ${strWhere}
and a.rid_cust = #{rid} and a.flag = 1 order by ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectMemberList */ SELECT a.mbr_no as mbrNo /* 회원 번호 */ ,c.chnl_nm as chnlNm /* 가입 채널 */ ,CONVERT(varchar(10), a.join_date, 120) as joinDate /* 가입 일자 */ ,a.mbr_type_cd as mbrTypeCd /* 회원 유형 코드 */ ,cd.mark_name as mbrTypeNm /* 회원 유형명 */ ,a.mbr_stat_cd as mbrStatCd /* 회원 상태코드 */ ,cd1.mark_name as mbrStatNm /* 부가 정보 유형 명 */ ,b.pgm_nm as pgmNm /* 로열티 프로그램명*/ ,d.tier_nm as tierNm /* 등급*/ FROM loy.loy_mbr a WITH (NOLOCK) inner join loy.loy_pgm b WITH (NOLOCK) on a.rid_pgm = b.rid left outer join LOY.LOY_CHNL c WITH (NOLOCK) on a.rid_chnl_join = c.rid left outer join loy.loy_tiers d WITH (NOLOCK) on a.rid_tier_cur = d.rid left outer join com.comm_code cd WITH (NOLOCK) on a.mbr_type_cd = cd.code_name and cd.group_code = 'LOY_MEM_TYPE_CD' and cd.flag = 1 and cd.lang = #{lang} left outer join com.comm_code cd1 WITH (NOLOCK) on a.mbr_stat_cd = cd1.code_name and cd1.group_code = 'LOY_MEM_STAT_CD' and cd1.flag = 1 and cd1.lang = #{lang} WHERE ${strSVCType} and ${strWhere}
and a.rid_cust = #{rid} /* 'recCust0001' */ and a.flag = 1 order by ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustAddInfo */ SELECT a.rid as rid /* 부가정보 RID */ ,a.rid_cust as ridCust /* RID_고객 */ ,a.add_info_type_cd as addInfoTypeCd /* 부가 정보 유형 코드 */ ,a.attr_type_cd as attrTypeCd /* 속성 유형 코드 */ ,a.attr_val as attrVal /* 속성 값*/ FROM loy.loy_cust_add_info a WHERE a.rid = #{rid}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustListPage */ SELECT lc.CUST_NO AS custNo , lc.CUST_NM AS custNm , lc.hhp AS hhp , lc.CUST_TYPE_CD AS custtypeCd , lc.CUST_STAT_CD AS custStatCd , CONVERT(varchar(10), lc.SBSC_DATE, 120) AS sbscDate , lch.CHNL_NM AS chnlNm , CONVERT(varchar, lch.CREATE_DATE, 120) AS createDate , lc.RID AS rid , ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_CUST lc WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST_I lci WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID = lci.RID_CUST AND lci.flag=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL lch WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID_SBSC_CHNL = lch.RID AND lc.flag=1 where lc.flag = 1 AND lc.CUST_STAT_CD in ('A','D') /* 활성고객,휴먼고객*/ AND ${strCondWhere} AND ${strWhere} order by ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCorpCustListPage */ SELECT lcm.RID AS rid , lcm.CUST_NO AS custNo , lcm.CUST_NM AS custNm , lcc.BIZR_NO AS bizrNo , lcm.HHP AS hhp , lcm.CUST_TYPE_CD AS custtypeCd , lcm.CUST_STAT_CD AS custStatCd , CONVERT(varchar(10), lcm.SBSC_DATE, 120) AS sbscDate , lc.CHNL_NM AS chnlNm , CONVERT(varchar, lcm.CREATE_DATE, 120) AS createDate , ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_CUST lcm WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST_C lcc WITH (NOLOCK) ON lcm.RID = lcc.RID_CUST AND lcc.flag=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL lc WITH (NOLOCK) ON lcm.RID_SBSC_CHNL = lc.RID AND lc.flag=1 WHERE lcm.flag = 1 AND lcm.CUST_STAT_CD in ('A','D') /* 활성고객만*/ AND ${strCondWhere} AND ${strWhere} order by ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCorpCustDetailNewPage */ SELECT TOP 1 lc.CUST_NO AS custNo , lc.CUST_TYPE_CD AS custTypeCd , lc.CUST_STAT_CD AS custStatCd , lc.CUST_NM AS custNm , CONVERT(varchar(10), lc.BIRTHDT, 120) AS birthDt , lc.HHP AS hhp , lc.EMAIL AS email , CONVERT(varchar(10), lc.SBSC_DATE, 120) AS sbscDate , lc1.CHNL_NM AS chnlNm , lc2.CHNL_NM AS lastChnlNm , lc.SBSC_PATH_CD AS sbscPathCd , CONVERT(varchar(10), lcsh.SVC_DT, 120) AS svrDt , lc.RCMMD_NO AS rcmmdNo , lc.DRMNCY_CHNG_UNIT AS drmmcyChngUnit , lcwi.USER_ID AS webId , LOY.FN_GET_AGE('Y1',lc.BIRTHDT) AS age , lc.CERT_TYPE_CD AS custCertTypeCd , lc.CERT_SUB_TYPE_CD AS certSubTypeCd , lc.CERT_VAL AS certVal , lcc.CMPNY_NM AS cmpnyNm , lcc.BIZR_NO AS bizrNo , lcc.JURIR_NO AS jurirNo , lcc.TEL_NO AS telNo , CONVERT(varchar(10), lcc.FOND_DT, 120) AS fondDt , lcc.CEO AS ceo , lcc.CHARGER AS charger , REGEXP_REPLACE(lcc.FAX, '(02|.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') AS fax , CONVERT(varchar, lc.CERT_DATE, 120) AS certDate , lc.ZIP AS zip , lc.ADRES AS adres , lc.BUNJI AS bunji , lcc.INDUTY AS induty , lcc.BIZCND AS bizcnd , lcc.CAPL AS capl FROM LOY.LOY_CUST lc WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST_C lcc WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID = lcc.RID_CUST AND lcc.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL lc1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID_SBSC_CHNL = lc1.RID AND lc1.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST_LOGIN_INF lcwi WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID = lcwi.RID_CUST AND lcwi.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST_SVC_HIST lcsh WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID = lcsh.RID_CUST AND lcsh.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL lc2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc2.RID = lcsh.RID_CHNL AND lc2.FLAG = 1 WHERE c.FLAG = 1 AND lc.CUST_STAT_CD in ('A','D') /* 활성고객만*/ AND lc.rid = #{rid}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.clearMaskCustList */ SELECT lc.CUST_NM AS unMaskCustNm , lc.HHP AS unMaskHhp FROM LOY.LOY_CUST lc WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST_I lci WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID = lci.RID_CUST AND lci.flag=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL lcc WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID_SBSC_CHNL = lcc.RID AND lcc.flag=1 WHERE lc.flag = 1 AND lc.CUST_STAT_CD in ('A','D') /* 활성고객만*/ AND lc.rid = #{rid}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.clearMaskCorpCustList */ SELECT lcm.CUST_NM AS unMaskCustNm ,lcm.HHP AS unMaskHhp FROM LOY.LOY_CUST lcm WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST_C lcc WITH (NOLOCK) ON lcm.RID = lcc.RID_CUST AND lcc.flag=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL lc WITH (NOLOCK) ON lcm.RID_SBSC_CHNL = lc.RID AND lc.flag=1 WHERE lcm.flag = 1 AND lcm.CUST_STAT_CD in ('A','D') /* 활성고객만*/ AND lcm.rid = #{rid}
/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustRid */ SELECT cust_no AS custNo FROM LOY.LOY_CUST WHERE rid = #{rid}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustAgreList */ SELECT t1.agreTypeCd , t1.ver , t1.regDate , t1.custRid , t1.rid , t1.termRid , t1.termVerRid , t1.totalCount FROM ( SELECT lca.AGRE_TYPE_CD AS agreTypeCd , ltv.VER AS ver , CONVERT(varchar, lca.REG_DATE, 120) AS regDate , lca.RID_CUST AS custRid , lca.RID AS rid , lt.RID AS termRid , lca.RID_TERMS_VER AS termVerRid , ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_CUST_AGRE lca WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS_VER ltv WITH (NOLOCK) ON lca.RID_TERMS_VER = ltv.RID AND ltv.FLAG = 1 JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS lt WITH (NOLOCK) ON lt.RID = ltv.RID_TERMS AND lt.FLAG = 1 JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS_PGM ltp WITH (NOLOCK) ON ltp.RID_TERMS_VER = ltv.RID AND ltp.FLAG = 1 WHERE lca.FLAG = 1 AND lca.RID_CUST = #{rid} AND lca.AGRE_YN = 'Y' AND ${strCondWhere} AND ${strWhere} UNION SELECT lca.AGRE_TYPE_CD AS agreTypeCd , null AS ver , CONVERT(varchar, lca.REG_DATE, 120) AS regDate , lca.RID_CUST AS custRid , lca.RID AS rid , lt.RID AS termRid , lca.RID_TERMS_VER AS termVerRid , ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_CUST_AGRE lca WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS_RCV_CHNL ltrc WITH (NOLOCK) ON lca.AGRE_TYPE_CD = ltrc.MKT_RCV_CHNL_CD AND ltrc.FLAG = 1 JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS lt WITH (NOLOCK) ON ltrc.RID_TERMS = lt.RID AND lt.flag = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS_VER ltv WITH (NOLOCK) ON ltv.RID_TERMS = lt.RID AND ltv.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS_PGM ltp WITH (NOLOCK) ON ltp.RID_TERMS_VER = ltv.RID AND ltp.FLAG = 1 WHERE lca.FLAG = 1 AND lca.RID_CUST = #{rid} AND lca.AGRE_YN = 'Y' AND ${strCondWhere} AND ${strWhere} ) t1 ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustAgreHistList */ SELECT t1.agreTypeCd , t1.ver , t1.agreYn , t1.regDate , t1.rid , t1.termRid , t1.termVerRid , t1.totalCount FROM (SELECT lcah.AGRE_TYPE_CD AS agreTypeCd , ltv.VER AS ver , lcah.AGRE_YN AS agreYn , CONVERT(varchar, lcah.REG_DATE, 120) AS regDate , lcah.RID AS rid , lt.RID AS termRid , lcah.RID_TERMS_VER AS termVerRid , ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_CUST_AGRE_HIST lcah WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS_VER ltv WITH (NOLOCK) ON lcah.RID_TERMS_VER = ltv.RID AND ltv.FLAG = 1 JOIN LOY.LOY_TERMS lt WITH (NOLOCK) ON lt.RID = ltv.RID_TERMS AND lt.FLAG = 1 WHERE lcah.FLAG = 1 AND lcah.RID_CUST = #{rid} AND lcah.AGRE_TYPE_CD = #{agreTypeCd} AND ${strCondWhere} AND ${strWhere} ) t1 ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectAlterSvrHistList */ SELECT lmam.ACTION_DT AS actionDt , lmam.MSG_TYPE AS msgType , lc.CHNL_NM AS chnlNm , lmam.MSG AS msg , lmam.SHOW_YN AS showYn , lmam.CONFIRM_DT AS confirmDt , ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_MBR_ALERT_MSG lmam WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_MBR lmm WITH (NOLOCK) on lmm.RID = lmam.RID_MBR AND lmm.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL lc WITH (NOLOCK) ON lc.RID = lmam.RID_CHNL AND lc.FLAG = 1 WHERE ${strWhere} AND lmam.FLAG = 1 AND lmam.RID_MBR in ( SELECT RID FROM LOY.LOY_MBR WHERE RID_CUST = #{rid} ) ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectChangeHistList */ SELECT lmch.CREATE_DATE AS createDate , lmch.CHG_COL AS chgCol , lmch.BCHNG_DATA AS bchngData , lmch.ACHNG_DATA AS achngData , e.NAME AS employName , ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_MBR_CHG_HIST lmch WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN com.crm_user cu WITH (NOLOCK) ON cu.rid = lmch.CREATE_BY AND cu.FLAG = 1 LEFT JOIN com.employee e WITH (NOLOCK) ON cu.ID_EMPLOYEE = e.id AND e.FLAG = 1 WHERE lmch.FLAG = 1 AND lmch.RID_MBR in ( SELECT RID FROM LOY.LOY_MBR WHERE RID_CUST = #{rid} ) ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustMbrRelList */ SELECT CONVERT(varchar(10), A.create_date, 120) AS createDate, CONVERT(varchar(10), A.MODIFY_DATE, 120) AS modifyDate, G.CUST_NO AS custNo, G.CUST_NM AS custNm, B.CARD_NO AS cardNo, A.STAT_CD AS statCd, C.BR_NM AS brNm, ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_MBR T2 WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_MBR_C_REL A WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.RID_MBR_C = T2.RID LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_MBR_CARD B WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.RID_MBR_CARD = B.RID AND B.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN LOY.LOY_MBR_C_BR C WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.RID_BR = C.RID AND C.FLAG = 1 INNER JOIN LOY.LOY_MBR F WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.RID_MBR = F.RID AND F.FLAG = 1 INNER JOIN LOY.LOY_CUST G WITH (NOLOCK) ON F.RID_CUST = G.RID AND G.FLAG = 1 WHERE ${strWhere} AND T2.RID_CUST = #{ridMbrC} AND T2.MBR_STAT_CD = 'A' ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}

/* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustBranchDetail */ SELECT A.RID AS rid, A.BR_NO AS brNo, A.BR_NM AS brNm, A.RID_CHNL AS ridChnl, B.CHNL_NM AS chnlNm, A.CHARGER AS charger, A.TEL_NO AS telNo FROM LOY.LOY_MBR_C_BR A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN LOY.LOY_CHNL B WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.RID_CHNL = B.RID AND B.FLAG = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND A.RID = #{rid} AND A.FLAG = 1
mapper.insert: /* LoyCustomerMapper.insertCustBranch */ INSERT INTO LOY.LOY_MBR_C_BR ( RID, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, BR_NO, BR_NM, RID_CHNL, CHARGER, TEL_NO, RID_MBR_C ) VALUES ( #{rid}, #{createBy}, #{modifyBy}, #{brNo}, #{brNm}, #{ridChnl}, #{charger}, #{telNo}, #{ridMbrC} )
mapper.update: /* LoyCustomerMapper.updateCustBranch */ UPDATE LOY.LOY_MBR_C_BR SET MODIFY_DATE = getDate(), MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy}, BR_NO = #{brNo}, BR_NM = #{brNm}, RID_CHNL = #{ridChnl}, CHARGER = #{charger}, TEL_NO = #{telNo} WHERE 1 = 1 AND RID = #{rid}
mapper.select: /* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustBnftDetail */ SELECT A.RID AS rid, CONVERT(varchar(10), A.CREATE_DATE, 120) AS createDate, CONVERT(varchar(10), A.START_DATE, 120) AS startDate, CONVERT(varchar(10), A.END_DATE, 120) AS endDate, A.QTY AS qty, A.RID_OFR AS ridOfr, B.OFR_NO AS ofrNo, B.OFR_NM AS ofrNm FROM LOY.LOY_MBR_C_BNFT A WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN LOY.LOY_OFR B WITH (NOLOCK) ON A.RID_OFR = B.RID AND B.FLAG = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND A.RID = #{rid} AND A.FLAG = 1
mapper.insert: /* LoyCustomerMapper.insertCustBnft */ INSERT INTO LOY.LOY_MBR_C_BNFT ( RID, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, START_DATE, END_DATE, QTY, RID_OFR, RID_MBR_C ) VALUES ( #{rid}, #{createBy}, #{modifyBy}, CONVERT(varchar, #{startDate}, 120), CONVERT(varchar, #{endDate}, 120), #{qty}, #{ridOfr}, #{ridMbrC} )
mapper.update: /* LoyCustomerMapper.updateCustBnft */ UPDATE LOY.LOY_MBR_C_BNFT SET MODIFY_DATE = getDate(), MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy}, START_DATE = CONVERT(varchar, #{startDate}, 120), END_DATE = CONVERT(varchar, #{endDate}, 120), QTY = #{qty}, RID_OFR = #{ridOfr} WHERE 1 = 1 AND RID = #{rid}
mapper.select: /* LoyCustomerMapper.selectCustSettleDetail */ SELECT RID AS rid, STL_CYCLE_CD AS stlCycleCd, SHA_CHNL_CD AS shaChnlCd, CHNL_SHA_RATE AS chnlShaRate FROM LOY.LOY_MBR_C_SETTLE WHERE 1=1 AND RID_MBR_C = #{ridMbrC} AND FLAG = 1
mapper.insert: /* LoyCustomerMapper.insertCustSettle */ INSERT INTO LOY.LOY_MBR_C_SETTLE ( RID, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, STL_CYCLE_CD, SHA_CHNL_CD, CHNL_SHA_RATE, RID_MBR_C ) VALUES ( #{rid}, #{createBy}, #{modifyBy}, #{stlCycleCd}, #{shaChnlCd}, #{chnlShaRate}, #{ridMbrC} )
mapper.update: /* LoyCustomerMapper.updateCustSettle */ UPDATE LOY.LOY_MBR_C_SETTLE SET RID = #{rid}, STL_CYCLE_CD = #{stlCycleCd}, SHA_CHNL_CD = #{shaChnlCd}, CHNL_SHA_RATE = #{chnlShaRate}, MODIFY_DATE = getDate(), MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy} WHERE 1 = 1 AND RID = #{rid}
mapper.select: /* LoyMbrMapper.selectCustSegmentRuleHist */ SELECT h.ID AS id , CONVERT(varchar, h.CREATE_DATE, 120) AS createDate , h.CREATE_BY AS createByName , c.CSEG_NM AS csegNm , s.CSEG_STAGE_NM AS csegStageNm , h.CSEG_TYPE_CD AS csegTypeCd , ${strColumn} FROM LOY.LOY_CSEG_HIST h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN LOY.LOY_MBR lm WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.RID_MBR= lm.RID AND lm.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN anl.anl_cseg_mst c WITH (NOLOCK) ON c.ID = h.CSEG_ID AND c.FLAG = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN anl.ANL_CSEG_STAGE s WITH (NOLOCK) ON s.id=h.CSEG_STAGE_ID AND s.FLAG =1 WHERE ${strWhere} AND lm.rid_cust = #{rid} AND h.FLAG = 1 ORDER BY ${strOrderby} ${strEndPaging}
